application:
Crawling Crawling application for the iCub 0.0.1
author.name
velocityControlDebugged --robot icubGazeboSim --part left_arm --period 10 localhost
velocityControlDebugged --robot icubGazeboSim --part right_arm --period 10 localhost
velocityControlDebugged --robot icubGazeboSim --part left_leg --period 10 localhost
velocityControlDebugged --robot icubGazeboSim --part right_leg --period 10 localhost
velocityControlDebugged --robot icubGazeboSim --part head --period 10 localhost
velocityControlDebugged --robot icubGazeboSim --part torso --period 10 localhost
# crawl generator
crawlGenerator --robot icubGazeboSim --part left_arm --file contexts/crawling/left_armConfig.ini localhost
crawlGenerator --robot icubGazeboSim --part right_arm --file contexts/crawling/right_armConfig.ini localhost
crawlGenerator --robot icubGazeboSim --part left_leg --file contexts/crawling/left_legConfig.ini localhost
crawlGenerator --robot icubGazeboSim --part right_leg --file contexts/crawling/right_legConfig.ini localhost
crawlGenerator --robot icubGazeboSim --part head --file contexts/crawling/headConfig.ini localhost
crawlGenerator --robot icubGazeboSim --part torso --file contexts/crawling/torsoConfig.ini localhost
